_header: Saint John the gospeller says us / That to the Jews said Jesu
_description: Gospel for Passion Sunday in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte Ione þe gospellere saise vsþat to þe Iewes
                    saide iesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Of tholemodenes i will now tellA litil tale if ȝe will
                    dwell
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gospiler seiþ vsþat to þe Iewes
                    seide Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He hudde hym from heore bodi sihtIn gost þei nolde not
                    knowe his miht
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
IN þis godspell Saynt Ione telles vsÞat til þe iewes
                    saide ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…He prayses no tholemodnes I wisBot þat for his luf
                    kithed es
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title: Dominica in passione domini secundum Iohannem (p. 153)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Iohn þe Gospellere seyth to vsþat to þe iewis
                    seyde ihesus…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& for þat onli ȝeuiþ he medeas we of an
                    Ermyte rede
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica in Passione Domini Euangelium secundum Iohannem (f.
                    113)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint Iohn in his gospell sais vsThat to þe Iewes said
                    ihesus…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Of tholmodnes I will you tellA lityll tall if yhe will
                    duell

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint iohn þe godspeller sais vsÞat to þe iews þus spak ihesus…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Of tholemodnes þarfore I willA litill tale here tell ȝow till
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Dicebat ihesu crist turbis iudeorum & principibus.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica in passione secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 61vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.138-144.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Ihon in þe gospell says vsþat till þe Iewes
                    sayde Ihesus…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…off tholomenes I will ȝow tella lytyll tale &
                    ȝe will dewll

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gospeller says vsþat to þe Iowis sayd
                    ihesusWhech of ȝow al I ask ȝow…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Off þis pollmodnys will I ȝow tellA lytill tale
                    ȝyff ȝe will dwell
